verses.verse: Before <S%H2962><s%> the <S%H2706>decree<s%> bring <S%H3205>forth,<s%> before the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> as the <S%H4671>chaff,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.

Seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H6035>meek<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H6466>wrought<s%> his <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H6038>meekness:<s%> it may <S%H194>be<s%> ye shall be <S%H5641>hid<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation:<s%> they shall drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> at the noon <S%H6672>day,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> shall be rooted <S%H6131>up.<s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast,<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> of the <S%H3774>Cherethites!<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> you; O <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> I will even <S%H6>destroy<s%> thee, that there shall be <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
And the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5116>dwellings<s%> and <S%H3741>cottages<s%> for <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

And the <S%H2256>coast<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H5921>thereupon:<s%> in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall they lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> them, and turn <S%H7725>away<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1421>revilings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> their <S%H1366>border.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> as <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> even the <S%H4476>breeding<s%> of <S%H2738>nettles,<s%> and <S%H4417>saltpits,<s%> <S%H4379><s%> and a <S%H5704>perpetual<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H8077>desolation:<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H962>spoil<s%> them, and the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of my <S%H1471>people<s%> shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> them.

This <S%H2063><s%> shall they have <S%H8478>for<s%> their <S%H1347>pride,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> he will <S%H7329>famish<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and men shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> him, every <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

And he will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and <S%H6723>dry<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H5739>flocks<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> the <S%H6893>cormorant<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> the <S%H7090>bittern<s%> shall <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the upper <S%H3730>lintels<s%> of it; their <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> in the <S%H2474>windows;<s%> <S%H2721>desolation<s%> shall be in the <S%H5592>thresholds:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he shall <S%H6168>uncover<s%> the cedar <S%H731>work.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H5947>rejoicing<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H983>carelessly,<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%> in her <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am, and there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H5750>beside<s%> me: <S%H349>how<s%> is she <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a place for <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to lie <S%H4769>down<s%> in! every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> her shall <S%H8319>hiss,<s%> and <S%H5128>wag<s%> his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
